title: iT’s A sEtUp!! Johnny Depp Probably Smells Terrible 08.11.22
itunes:title: iT’s A sEtUp!! Johnny Depp Probably Smells Terrible 08.11.22
description:
In episode 1307, Jack and Miles are joined by actor, podcaster, and writer Korama Danquah to discuss… It definitely SOUNDS Like Whatever the FBI Has Could Be A Spice Rack, Johnny Depp Will Continue Making Sh-tty Cologne Commercials and more!

  1. Johnny Depp Will Continue Making Sh-tty Cologne Commercials
  2. Why is Johnny Depp still the face of Dior Sauvage?
  3. Dior perfume ad featuring Johnny Depp criticized over Native American tropes
  4. Dior pulls ad for Sauvage perfume amid criticism over Indigenous imagery
  5. Johnny Depp’s Dior Ad Co-Star Tanaya Beatty Speaks Out, Encourages Him to Donate to Native Cause
  6. Americans for Indian Opportunity 'deeply regrets' participation in Dior campaign
  7. How Disney and Johnny Depp Dealt With “The Lone Ranger” Racism Problem

LISTEN: Beach House by Carly Rae Jepsen

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
